body.p: Complement is a system of plasma that circulate in the blood in an inactive form. Complement is when it becomes attached to the surface of foreign cells (bacteria, fungi, red blood cells). One result of this complement fixation is that appear in the membrane of the foreign cell. This allows to rush in to the cell, which causes of the foreign cell. Some of the molecules released during complement fixation enhance phagocytosis. This is called . Other molecules amplify the inflammatory response.

fill_in_the_blank.choice: newly synthesized proteins and mRNA synthesis
MHC proteins and other self molecules

response.feedback: Correct.
Incorrect. Carbohydrates are sugars.
Incorrect. Lipids are fats and will not circulate freely in an aqueous environment.
Incorrect. Steroids are hormones or cell structure molecules.
Correct.
Incorrect. Damping means the signal is diminished.
Incorrect. Denaturing means the protein loses is structure and becomes inactive.
Incorrect. Digested means the cells degrade the protein into pieces.
Correct.
Incorrect. Molecular bridges would not help to destroy the foreign cell.
Incorrect. Protein synthesis and mRNA synthesis only occur inside cells.
Incorrect. Foreign cells do have MHC proteins; that is how your body knows they are foreign.
Correct.
Incorrect. There is no source of pure water in the body.
Incorrect. The pores are too small for the white blood cells to enter.
Incorrect. The pores are not ion channels so sodium would not be able to cross the cell membrane.
Correct.
Incorrect. Apoptosis is programmed cell death initiated by the cell.
Incorrect. Dehydration means fluids inside the cell would leave the cell because the cell is hypo-osomotic compared to the surrounding fluid.
Incorrect. Cells with holes in their membranes cannot undergo cell division.
Correct.
Incorrect. Cellular hybridization is when two cells fuse together.
Incorrect. Fertilization if when two gametes unite to form an zygote.
Incorrect. Differentiation is when a cell becomes more specialized.
